properties.verseOrder: v1 c v2 c v3 c

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What a fellowship, what a joy divine! Leaning on the everlasting arms;
What a blessedness, what a peace is mine! Leaning on the everlasting arms.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O how sweet to walk in this pilgrim way, Leaning on the everlasting arms;
O how bright the path grows from day to day, Leaning on the everlasting arms.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
What have I do dread? What have I to fear? Leaning on the everlasting arms;
I have blessed peace with my Lord so near, Leaning on the everlasting arms.

verse.name: c
verse.lines:
Leaning, leaning, Safe and secure from all alarms;
Leaning, leaning, Leaning on the everlasting arms.
